::Oblitertron/Prowl/Firearm/Proto::

Oblitertron yells as his hand falls off, the gestalt watching the two 
Maximals that had attacked him go off a ways. He bends down to pick up his 
fallen arm, smasing it into the stump on his wrist. Wires and plates bend as 
he jams it in, the hand non-functional but at least now there.

He turns around, looking down at the group of Maximals.

"You still want that one on one, Maximal?!" the giant bot yells, stepping 
forward and firing his optics at Firearm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm ducks under a shot, looking up at the towering gestalt. He growls.

"Perhaps I do!" he says in return, jumping up, his jetpack sending him flying 
up to Oblitertron's level, firing charges at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl looks up in surprize as Firearm flies off, the feathered Maximal 
growling. He looks over at the woods as Proto emerges, his chest melted and 
the rest of him full of dents from hitting the ground.

Looking at Koj, Prowl nods.

"Yeah. Dinobot will need help getting out of here," he says, knowing that 
Dinobot would probably object, but there was no time for childish pride. He 
looks at the rest of the Maximals, "All of you get back to base. Me and 
Firearm will catch up later on."

With that, Prowl launches himself into the air, flying up to help Firearm. 
Proto reaches the group, limping.

"Let's go," he says, looking around, "Who here can fly?"
